characters: Driver of a blue taxi, cyclist, driver of a black sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the frame, moving towards the intersection. A black sedan is moving from the left to the right side of the frame, crossing the intersection. A blue taxi is seen moving from the left side of the frame towards the center, eventually cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle is likely preparing to stop or slow down due to the presence of the cyclist and the black sedan crossing the intersection. The blue taxis movement from the left side of the frame towards the center indicates a potential cut-in behavior, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the intersection. 2) Front: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, crossing the intersection. 3) Left side: A blue taxi, approximately 3 meters away, moving towards the center and cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane.
